knowledge_panel.description: sonic the hedgehog 2 is an upcoming adventure-comedy film based on the video game franchise published by sega and sonic team. directed by jeff fowler and written by pat casey, josh miller and john whittington, it is the sequel to sonic the hedgehog. wikipedia
